title: Philadelphia Housing Authority Real Estate Transactions: 2010-June 2022
info:
These maps show represent the spatial distribution of all real estate transactions conducted by the Philadelphia Housing Authority (PHA) from 2010 until publication (June of 2022).
    The PHA is a large provider of public housing in the city of Philadelphia and partially funds itself through buying and selling land at profit. Each map helps to 
    show where land is being bought and sold across the city over the past decade.
author: Sid Feinberg (sidef1270
